topic.refined_topic: An educational guide to the A2A protocol's key concepts, explaining how AI agents discover, communicate, and collaborate through a shared open standard

title: How AI Agents Will Work Together: A Guide to the A2A Protocol
thesis: As AI moves from single-agent tools to multi-agent ecosystems, agents need a shared standard for discovering each other and collaborating. The A2A protocol provides that foundation through a small set of building blocks — Agent Cards, Tasks, Messages, and Execution Modes — that any agent can implement regardless of who built it.

metadata.title: How AI Agents Will Work Together: A Guide to the A2A Protocol
metadata.description: A practical guide to Google's A2A protocol, explaining how AI agents discover, communicate, and collaborate through Agent Cards, Tasks, Messages, and Execution Modes.
